00013 class OptionsError : public std::exception {
00014   const char* what() const throw () {
00015     return "Bad MODULES option";

00019 CFTimeAPGenerator::CFTimeAPGenerator(TAPGeneratorOptions* opts):
00020         TVAnalysedPulseGenerator("CFTime",opts){
00021   //fConstantFraction = opts->GetDouble("constfrac", 0.1);
00022   fConstantFractionTime.constant_fraction = 0.2;
00023   if (fConstantFractionTime.constant_fraction <= 0. || fConstantFractionTime.constant_fraction >=100.)
00024     throw OptionsError();
00025 }
00026 
00027 int CFTimeAPGenerator::ProcessPulses(const PulseIslandList& pulseList,
00028                                      AnalysedPulseList& analysedList) {
00029   fConstantFractionTime.th_frac = 0.25;
00030 
00031   // Get the variables we want from TSetupData/SetupNavigator
00032   std::string bankname = pulseList[0]->GetBankName();
00033   fConstantFractionTime.pedestal = SetupNavigator::Instance()->GetPedestal(bankname);
00034   fConstantFractionTime.trigger_polarity = TSetupData::Instance()->GetTriggerPolarity(bankname);
00035   fConstantFractionTime.max_adc_value = std::pow(2, TSetupData::Instance()->GetNBits(bankname)) - 1;
00036   fConstantFractionTime.clock_tick_in_ns = TSetupData::Instance()->GetClockTick(bankname);
00037   fConstantFractionTime.time_shift = TSetupData::Instance()->GetTimeShift(bankname);
00038 
00039 
00040   for (unsigned int iTPI = 0; iTPI < pulseList.size(); ++iTPI) {
00041     TPulseIsland* tpi = pulseList.at(iTPI);
00042 
00043     double time = fConstantFractionTime(tpi);
00044 
00045     TAnalysedPulse* tap = MakeNewTAP(iTPI);
00046     tap->SetTime(time);
00047     analysedList.push_back(tap);
00048   }
00049 
00050   return 0;
00051 }
00052 
00053 // Similar to the modules, this macro registers the generator with
00054 // MakeAnalysedPulses. The first argument is compulsory and gives the name of
00055 // this generator. All subsequent arguments will be used as names for arguments
00056 // given directly within the modules file.  See the github wiki for more.
00057 //
00058 // NOTE: for TAP generators OMIT the APGenerator part of the class' name
00059 ALCAP_TAP_GENERATOR(CFTime);
